f78b69e7-75e6-44b9-acc9-5d91d5a04521.message: Hello Jane, I wanted to share all the information regarding my mental health diagnosis with you. I was diagnosed with generalized anxiety disorder in December 2022. In February 2023, I was diagnosed with major depressive disorder. My recent assessment has indicated that my depression symptoms have moderately worsened. Please let me know if you need any additional details or if we should discuss this further. Thank you for your continued support.
